attributes.additional_details: The A&E in West Middlesex Hospital is facing closure. Without the department, ambulances will have to travel a considerably larger distance to other hospitals. Please do support this cause by signing the epetition, to help make a difference for the Hounslow Borough constituents and neighbouring towns. Together, we can make a change!

rejection.details: Please see:  stop the planned closing of A&E departments in four west london hospitals
